newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: PNOC unit seeks jv with First Gas Holdings.
newsitem.headline: PNOC unit seeks jv with First Gas Holdings.

text.p: The Philippine National Oil Co-Explortion Corp (PNOC-EC), said on Wednesday it is planning to take up to 70 percent in a liquefied natural gas (LNG) storage terminal and regasification plant being built by First Gas Holdings Corp.

PNOC-EC president Rufino Bomasang told reporters the PNOC PNOC.PS board is conducting a final review of the plans to buy a stake in the LNG project as well as a 30 percent interest in future lng-fired power plants.
"We are willing to go into joint venture with anybody for the development of the lng industry in the Philippines from the terminal all the way to utilisation," Bomasang told Reuters.
First Gas is a joint venture of First Philippine Holdings and British Gas.
Bomasang said the PNOC's board of directors will take a final decision on PNOC-EC's participation in lng projects on January 22. - Manila newsroom 63 2 8418939 fax 8176267
